text: niccayamaka allah; evarkal iman kontu salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo avarkalaic cuvarkkankalil piravecikkac ceykiran; avarrin kile arakal otik kontirukkum; anal nirakarippavarkalo (ivvulaka cukankalai) anupavittuk kontum, mirukankal tini tinpataip pol tinru kontum irukkirarkal. (Naraka) neruppe ivarkal tankumitamaka irukkum
